mh:internal:port.description: The default port for this server

mh:health_polling_interval.describe: An interval to refresh the health status asynchronously

mh:initialChunkSizeFactor.describe: The fraction of a chunk that is used for the initial creation

mh:splitLimitFactor.describe: At which multiple of the chunkSize do we split a chunk

mh:mergeLimitFactor.describe: At which multiple of the chunkSize do we merge a chunk

mh:maxNodeSizeFactor.describe: Maximum size of a delta encoded node as a multiple of the initial chunkSize

mh:maxNodeSubEntries.describe: Maximum number of a delta encoded sub-nodes in a single node

mh:bTreeOrder.describe: Maximum number of children for one B-Tree node

mh:nodesPerHierarchicalHistoryLevel.describe: How many nodes do we store in one level of the hierarchical history before creating a node a level higher

mh:nodeCache:size.describe: Cache size in bytes for Materialized History nodes

mh:nodeCache:expiry.describe: Retention period for a node in the cache

loadUpdateIntervalMs.describe: The interval in milliseconds to which the server must report its load

materializedHistoryService:enableRequest.describe: Whether or not to HMAC sign requests to MaterializedHistoryService

materializedHistoryService:requestSignin.describe: Secrets to use for request signing with their expiry

materializedHistoryService:signatureTole.describe: How many milliseconds to tolerate for the HMAC signature

materializedHistoryService:supportedSign.describe: Algorithms supported for the request authentication

materializedHistory:consistencyWait.describe: How long, in ms, to wait during a read after write, for the write to take effect

materializedHistory:consistencyWaitSleep.describe: How long, interval to sleep while performing the materializedHistory:consistencyWait
